entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023
